statements.select: IF #WHERE_UMA_User_ID# = 'SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT NULL 'UMA_ID' , NULL 'UMA_Org_ID' , NULL 'UMA_User_ID' , T1.MenuD_ID 'UMA_MenuD_ID' , T1.MenuD_Name , T2.Menu_ID , T2.Menu_Name FROM SM_MenuDetail T1 INNER JOIN SM_Menu T2 ON T2.Menu_ID = T1.MenuD_Menu_ID AND T2.Menu_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.MenuD_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T1.MenuD_Menu_ID , T1.MenuD_ID END ELSE BEGIN SELECT T1.UMA_ID , T1.UMA_Org_ID , T1.UMA_User_ID , T1.UMA_MenuD_ID , T3.MenuD_Name , T4.Menu_ID , T4.Menu_Name FROM SM_UserMenuAuthority T1 INNER JOIN SM_User T2 ON T2.User_ID = T1.UMA_User_ID AND T2.User_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_MenuDetail T3 ON T3.MenuD_ID = T1.UMA_MenuD_ID AND T3.MenuD_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_Menu T4 ON T4.Menu_ID = T3.MenuD_Menu_ID AND T4.Menu_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.UMA_IsValid = 1 AND T1.UMA_Org_ID = #WHERE_UMA_Org_ID# AND T1.UMA_User_ID = #WHERE_UMA_User_ID# END

IF #WHERE_UAA_User_ID# = 'SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT NULL 'UAA_ID' , NULL 'UAA_Org_ID' , NULL 'UAA_User_ID' , T1.MDA_MenuD_ID 'UAA_MenuD_ID' , T1.MDA_Action_ID 'UAA_Action_ID' , T2.Act_Name FROM SM_MenuDetailAction T1 INNER JOIN SM_Action T2 ON T2.Act_ID = T1.MDA_Action_ID AND T2.Act_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.MDA_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T1.MDA_MenuD_ID , T1.MDA_Action_ID END ELSE BEGIN SELECT T1.UAA_ID , T1.UAA_Org_ID , T1.UAA_User_ID , T1.UAA_MenuD_ID , T1.UAA_Action_ID , T2.Act_Name FROM SM_UserActionAuthority T1 INNER JOIN SM_Action T2 ON T2.Act_ID = T1.UAA_Action_ID AND T2.Act_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.UAA_IsValid = 1 AND T1.UAA_Org_ID = #WHERE_UAA_Org_ID# AND T1.UAA_User_ID = #WHERE_UAA_User_ID# ORDER BY T1.UAA_MenuD_ID , T1.UAA_Action_ID END

IF #WHERE_UMA_User_ID# = 'SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT T1.Menu_ID , T1.Menu_Name FROM SM_Menu T1 WHERE T1.Menu_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T1.Menu_ID END ELSE BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT T3.Menu_ID , T3.Menu_Name FROM SM_UserMenuAuthority T1 INNER JOIN SM_MenuDetail T2 ON T2.MenuD_ID = T1.UMA_MenuD_ID AND T2.MenuD_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_Menu T3 ON T3.Menu_ID = T2.MenuD_Menu_ID AND T3.Menu_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.UMA_IsValid = 1 AND T1.UMA_Org_ID = #WHERE_UMA_Org_ID# AND T1.UMA_User_ID = #WHERE_UMA_User_ID# ORDER BY T3.Menu_ID END

IF #WHERE_UJA_User_ID# = 'SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT T1.BJ_ID , T1.BJ_Name , NULL 'UJA_ID' , NULL 'UJA_User_ID' FROM CSM_BatchJob T1 WHERE T1.BJ_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T1.BJ_CreatedTime END ELSE BEGIN SELECT T1.BJ_ID , T1.BJ_Name , T2.UJA_ID , T2.UJA_User_ID FROM CSM_BatchJob T1 INNER JOIN SM_UserJobAuthority T2 ON T2.UJA_BJ_ID = T1.BJ_ID AND T2.UJA_User_ID = #WHERE_UJA_User_ID# AND T2.UJA_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.BJ_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T1.BJ_CreatedTime END
